items.sentence: Tom certainly seems easier to get along with than Mary.
I know that both Tom and Mary have finished doing that.
I leave my windows and doors unlocked most of the time.
Tom called to tell me he\'d been in a traffic accident.
In Japan there aren\'t any lakes bigger than Lake Biwa.
It was kind of fun hanging out with your parents today.
I don\'t know whether Tom still lives in Boston or not.
I want to become both physically and mentally stronger.
Tom and Mary spent as much time together as they could.
Didn\'t you know Tom passed away about three years ago?
Didn\'t you know Tom used to teach French in Australia?
Didn\'t you know Tom was going to go fishing with Mary?
Didn\'t you know that Tom was in Australia last winter?
Can you describe what that experience was like for you?
Can you stand on your head for more than three minutes?
You have something to say about everything, don\'t you?
What Tom has suggested is perhaps the easiest solution.
What Tom really wanted was enough money to buy a house.
There\'s a very good chance that Tom will get that job.
Tom wants to do something special for Mary\'s birthday.
